description: Detects PowerShell scripts to set the ACL to a file in the Windows folder
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: PowerShell Set-Acl On Windows Folder - PsScript
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Cc][Ll]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Aa][Cc][Ll][Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ \"[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ \"[Cc]\:\/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ '[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ '[Cc]\:\/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ [Cc]\:\\\\\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ [Cc]\:\/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ $[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ii][Rr].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ \"$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ii][Rr].*/ OR /.*\-[Pp][Aa][Tt][Hh]\ '$[Ee][Nn][Vv]\:[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ii][Rr].*/) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*FullControl* OR *Allow*))
